about_the_game:
Background

Due to global warming, the Antarctic environment will change significantly. The glacier is cracking and the sea is overflowing with trash...
The main character, a baby penguin, gets separated from the group when the glacier splits.
Please make the abandoned baby penguin return to the arms of the family again.

3D Block Sokoban

My Earth is a 3D block Sokoban game that moves blocks to create a path.

Interaction with ice blocks

Baby penguins can push ice blocks and jump. Connect the path with the ice blocks you can push.
Ice blocks consist of regular glaciers and melting glaciers.

Cormorant

The cormorant is a friend who accompanies the baby penguin on his journey. It's a friendly bird that helps you get back to the flock.

Seal

A fearsome seal that preys on baby penguins. The baby penguin must avoid the seal.
Seals can be removed using ice blocks

killer whale

Killer whales are at the top of the Antarctic food chain. The baby penguin is too small to feed the killer whale.
Killer whales have a habit of playing ball with other creatures. You can use this to get to the glacier you can't reach.

name: My Earth Demo
short_description: My Earth is a 3D Sokoban game. In an environment where glaciers are melting due to global warming, the main character, a baby penguin, is separated from the group. The baby penguins find their way back to the colony.
